channel.title: S1 sannin run tip
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "S1 sannin run tip" - easy way to do sannin run in season 1

item.title: Re: S1 sannin run tip
item.content:encoded: Nadeshiko's Perfect Girl Evolution: Loli Loli jutsu has now been changed to affect all Party Room bonuses, both Friend points and Daily Ranking. Confirmed by at least 4 people on the BvS forums beyond myself.

item.title: Re: S1 sannin run tip
item.content:encoded:
Also use the new NinjaOn you can win on the Jackpot.
+5% AP/JXP/Rep for the day, stacks up to 10 of them for a max bonus of +50% AP/JXP/Rep for the day & are zero appetite. Then combine with a Note Rush. And as Yoshirou pointed out, if you can, get that Kaiju drop to boost even higher.

item.title: Re: S1 sannin run tip
item.content:encoded: Ah, I mixed up Sannin & 2 B A Master in the case of the Note rush. And I double-checked, it does only helps in missions.

item.title: Re: S1 sannin run tip
item.content:encoded:
1. you do a note rush on the day you are trying to become sannin, not before
2. I'm pretty sure a note rush only helps in missions, but a Catgirl Entourage helps in party house bashes as it doubles the ranking xp of them.

item.title: Re: S1 sannin run tip
item.content:encoded: Don't forget to possibly also get a Note Rush the day prior to attempting the quest either. If nothing else that extra +20% daily ranking bonus will really help, as iirc (and correct me if I'm wrong), it'll even affect the ranking bonuses you get from the multiple party bashes. That and helping with whatever missions you do that day anyways.

item.title: Re: S1 sannin run tip
item.content:encoded:
Correcting your post hereâ€¦.

You are drinking 7 Silver ELIXIRS (not potion, since those give 3000 FP when only one person is in your team).

6-7 Elixirs, and 4 All-Out-Bashes are pretty much a given Sanin Run. You simply have to gather 120k ryo for the 4 bashes, and your set. That is about 2 weeks of Reaper mission, which will also net you about 300 silver petals. Those 2 weeks will also give you enough time to gather all the potion bases that you would need.

item.title: S1 sannin run tip
item.content:encoded: the guide really doesnt understand how good silver elixers are. they only take 50 appetite to drink so they are a lot better than 60 stamina in season1 (if you don't have gold pots or candy of course). my way of easily getting to 1 mill xp is drink 7 silver pots (cici and lulu to make them -10 appetite each, hallow leg, +60 from juice, and village appetite bonus), you can easily get300k xp from A-rank missions(or even B-rank if you want to) and do parties for any extra xp you want
